hero.subtitle: Experience artisanal weaving, meet our alpacas, shop handcrafted wool products, and discover sustainable farming. Welcome to a place where tradition meets Mediterranean calm.

features.sectionSubtitle: We blend hospitality, craftsmanship, and animal welfare into every experience

farm.title: Working Farm
farm.description: A genuine, active alpaca farm and weaving studio in the heart of Ibiza. Every piece tells a story of our animals and land.

artisan.title: Artisanal Process
artisan.description: Hand-processed fibers, natural dyes, traditional patterns. Every step honors the craft and the alpacas.

sustainable.title: Sustainable & Natural
sustainable.description: Organic practices, eco-friendly products, biodegradable packaging. Care for animals and planet.

appointment.title: By Appointment
appointment.description: Intimate visits only. We keep our farm calm and peaceful for the alpacas — and for you.

quality.title: Premium Quality
quality.description: Every product is hand-checked. We stand behind the quality and longevity of our work.

welfare.title: Animal Welfare First
welfare.description: Our alpacas are cherished members of our family. Their comfort and happiness drive everything we do.

experiences.sectionSubtitle: Beyond tours — create custom memories at our farm

privateFarm.title: Private Farm

workshops.title: Workshops

events.title: Events

about.title: About Alpacas Ibiza
about.storyText: Alpacas Ibiza was founded on the belief that tourism can be meaningful, artisanal, and deeply connected to animal welfare. We created the first alpaca farm on the island to share our passion for these gentle creatures and their incredible fiber.
